headline: Ask HN: Is Amazon distributing malware infested laptops?
description:
I recently bought an upgraded HP laptop from Amazon. The memory and storage were upgraded by Oydisen Electronics. 
After 2 weeks of use, the laptop shut off. In restarting, an HP screen let me know that no OS was detected. I worked through some HP troubleshooting steps and the laptop could not detect an SSD. I tried taking the back panel off to see if the SSD had somehow come loose, but it is glued to something in the middle, and forcing it off would mean breaking the back panel and maybe the motherboard if that is what it is glued to. 
I asked the seller about this and they just told me to return it, but I had already saved so many personal files to the drive when it disappeared, and I do not feel comfortable returning it like this.
I have tried Linux/Windows USB installations, but neither could detect any drives (after USB).
It seems that I will be taking the $1000 hit on this. Amazon refuses to refund me without a return, and returning it would mean submitting my financials, health records, passwords, etc., to the mercy of Oydisen Electronics. 
Could this be a self-destructing laptop by design of Oydisen Electronics? It certainly looks that way to me.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 亚马逊是否在分发被恶意软件侵袭的笔记本电脑？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 亞馬遜是否在分發被惡意軟件侵襲的筆記本電腦？
description_zh-Hans:
我最近从亚马逊买了一台升级版的惠普笔记本电脑。内存和存储是由Oydisen电子公司升级的。
使用了2周后，笔记本关机了。在重新启动时，一个惠普屏幕让我知道没有检测到操作系统。我通过惠普的一些故障排除步骤，笔记本电脑无法检测到SSD。我试着把后面板拆下来，看看固态硬盘是否以某种方式松动了，但它是粘在中间的东西上的，强行把它拆下来就意味着打破后面板，如果它是粘在主板上的，可能就会打破主板。
我问了卖家这个问题，他们只是告诉我把它退掉，但是当它消失的时候，我已经把很多个人文件保存在硬盘上了，我觉得这样退掉它不太合适。
我试过Linux/Windows的USB安装，但都无法检测到任何驱动器（USB后）。
看来，我将为此承担1000美元的损失。亚马逊拒绝在没有退货的情况下给我退款，而退货则意味着将我的财务状况、健康记录、密码等提交给奥迪森电子公司的怜悯。
这可能是一个由Oydisen Electronics设计的自毁的笔记本电脑吗？对我来说，它肯定是这样的。
